languages.text: Если кольцо и правда некогда было вратами, теперь оно не способно выполнять свое предназначение. Звездный жар и гравитационная сила не позволят пройти через него ни одному кораблю. По мнению корабельных астропатов, фиолетовые облака — еще более опасное явление, свидетельствующее о том, что сквозь портал силы варпа рвутся в реальный мир. Словно в подтверждение своей смертоносности, со следующей волной темного света кольцо выбрасывает обломки неопознанного пустотного корабля.

If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.
languages.original_text: Если кольцо и правда некогда было вратами, теперь оно не способно выполнять свое предназначение. Звездный жар и гравитационная сила не позволят пройти через него ни одному кораблю. По мнению корабельных астропатов, фиолетовые облака — еще более опасное явление, свидетельствующее о том, что сквозь портал силы варпа рвутся в реальный мир. Словно в подтверждение своей смертоносности, со следующей волной темного света кольцо выбрасывает обломки неопознанного пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: If the ring truly was a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into the real world. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of dark light the portal throws out the broken pieces of an unidentified voidship.

If the ring truly was a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into the real world. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of dark light the portal throws out the broken pieces of an unidentified voidship.

If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of Darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

languages.text: 就算这个圆环真的是传送门，那它现在的状况也并不适合传送。它散发着如同恒星般的热量与引力，没有任何舰船能通过其中。根据船上星语者所说，紫色的雷云比恒星气体更加危险。它的出现表明，亚空间之力正渴望从传送门流入真实世界。仿佛是为了强调它有多么致命，当下一道暗光波闪过时，传送门向外抛出了一艘身份不明的虚空舰残骸。
languages.original_text: If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

traits.locale_text: 就算这个圆环真的是传送门，那它现在的状况也并不适合传送。它散发着如同恒星般的热量与引力，没有任何舰船能通过其中。根据船上星语者所说，紫色的雷云比恒星气体更加危险。它的出现表明，亚空间之力正渴望从传送门流入真实世界。仿佛是为了强调它有多么致命，当下一道暗光波闪过时，传送门向外抛出了一艘身份不明的虚空舰残骸。

languages.text: 指輪が本当にポータルだったとしても、もはやポータルの役割を果たすにはふさわしくない。恒星の熱と重力のせいで、どんな船も通過することができない。船の感応通信官によれば、紫色の雲はさらに危険な現象で、<歪み>のパワーがポータルからリアルスペースに流れ出ようとしていることを示しているという。その危険さを見せつけるかのように、ダークライトの次の波とともに、ポータルは正体不明のヴォイドシップの粉々な残骸を投げ出す。
languages.original_text: If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of Darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

traits.locale_text: 指輪が本当にポータルだったとしても、もはやポータルの役割を果たすにはふさわしくない。恒星の熱と重力のせいで、どんな船も通過することができない。船の感応通信官によれば、紫色の雲はさらに危険な現象で、<歪み>のパワーがポータルからリアルスペースに流れ出ようとしていることを示しているという。その危険さを見せつけるかのように、ダークライトの次の波とともに、ポータルは正体不明のヴォイドシップの粉々な残骸を投げ出す。

languages.text: Si el anillo era realmente un portal, ya no sirve como tal. El calor estelar y la fuerza gravitatoria impiden a cualquier nave atravesarlo. Según los Astrópatas de la nave, las nubes púrpuras son un fenómeno aún más peligroso, pues indican que los poderes de la disformidad están deseando salir del portal al espacio real. Como para resaltar su carácter mortífero, con la siguiente oleada de luz oscura, el portal arroja los restos destrozados de una nave del vacío no identificada.
languages.original_text: If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

traits.locale_text: Si el anillo era realmente un portal, ya no sirve como tal. El calor estelar y la fuerza gravitatoria impiden a cualquier nave atravesarlo. Según los Astrópatas de la nave, las nubes púrpuras son un fenómeno aún más peligroso, pues indican que los poderes de la disformidad están deseando salir del portal al espacio real. Como para resaltar su carácter mortífero, con la siguiente oleada de luz oscura, el portal arroja los restos destrozados de una nave del vacío no identificada.

languages.text: War der Ring wirklich einmal ein Portal, so kann er gewiss nicht mehr als eines dienen. Die Hitze und Anziehungskraft des Sterns machen es Schiffen unmöglich, es zu durchqueren. Den Astropathen des Schiffs zufolge sind die violetten Wolken ein noch gefährlicheres Phänomen. Sie zeigen an, dass die Kräfte des Warp begierig darauf sind, aus dem Portal in den Realraum zu strömen. Wie um seine Tödlichkeit zu unterstreichen speit das Portal mit der nächsten Welle Dunkellicht die zertrümmerten Überreste eines unbekannten Raumschiffs aus.
languages.original_text: If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

traits.locale_text: War der Ring wirklich einmal ein Portal, so kann er gewiss nicht mehr als eines dienen. Die Hitze und Anziehungskraft des Sterns machen es Schiffen unmöglich, es zu durchqueren. Den Astropathen des Schiffs zufolge sind die violetten Wolken ein noch gefährlicheres Phänomen. Sie zeigen an, dass die Kräfte des Warp begierig darauf sind, aus dem Portal in den Realraum zu strömen. Wie um seine Tödlichkeit zu unterstreichen speit das Portal mit der nächsten Welle Dunkellicht die zertrümmerten Überreste eines unbekannten Raumschiffs aus.

languages.text: S'il s'agissait effectivement d'un portail, il est à présent hors d'usage. La chaleur stellaire et la force gravitationnelle en interdisent la traversée. Selon vos astropathes, les nuées violettes constituent un phénomène encore plus dangereux, preuve que les sombres pouvoirs du Warp cherchent à franchir le portail pour envahir l'espace réel. Comme pour faire la démonstration de sa propre létalité, lorsque survient l'onde de lumière noire suivante, la porte recrache les vestiges épars d'un bâtiment non identifié.
languages.original_text: If the ring truly were a portal, it is not fit to serve as one any longer. Stellar heat and gravitational force forbid any vessel from passing through it. According to the ship's Astropaths, the purple clouds are an even more dangerous phenomenon, indicating that the powers of the warp are eager to flow out of the portal into realspace. As if to highlight its deadliness, with the next wave of darklight, the portal throws out the shattered remains of an unidentified voidship.

traits.locale_text: S'il s'agissait effectivement d'un portail, il est à présent hors d'usage. La chaleur stellaire et la force gravitationnelle en interdisent la traversée. Selon vos astropathes, les nuées violettes constituent un phénomène encore plus dangereux, preuve que les sombres pouvoirs du Warp cherchent à franchir le portail pour envahir l'espace réel. Comme pour faire la démonstration de sa propre létalité, lorsque survient l'onde de lumière noire suivante, la porte recrache les vestiges épars d'un bâtiment non identifié.
